law.catch_line: Jurisdiction vested in department -- Repealing clause.
law.text: Jurisdiction in all matters pertaining to the distribution, sale and transportation of pesticides is by KRS 217.542 to 217.640 vested exclusively in the department and all acts and parts of acts inconsistent with KRS 217.542 to 217.640 are hereby expressly repealed including the provisions of KRS 217.400 which cover economic poisons subject to KRS 217.542 to 217.640.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 217, effective July 15, 1980; and ch. 295, sec. 61, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 68, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 1 -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 13, effective July 1, 1956.

metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by two 1980 acts which do not appear to be in conflict and have been compiled together.
